page:body.p: Note to developers: Please use this file to inform users about changes in the code or behaviour of Lenya. It is located under src/webapp/readme.xml. Its contents will be shown on the global welcome page, and also on the introduction page of every publication.

strong.em: You need to update your custom publication.xconf files!

page:body.p: As of revision FIXME, the file $YOURPUB/publication.xml is deprecated and no longer used. Its contents should be moved to $YOURPUB/config/publication.xconf.

Most important changes: All elements in publication.xconf must now be in the namespace http://apache.org/cocoon/lenya/publication/1.1, and <module/>, <proxy/>, and <resource-type> elements must now be grouped in <modules/>, <proxies/>, and <resource-types>. See the default publication for an example.
You can use webapp/lenya/resources/schemas/publication.rng to verify that your file is correct.
If you want to provide a custom README for your publication, you can put it in $YOURPUP/readme.xsl. Just copy this file over and modify to your needs.
